title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Virtual Laboratory Project-Based Learning Design for Engineering Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Enhancement of data collection and analysis skills for engineering problem-solving in a virtual laboratory environment.

Learners rotate through three roles (planner, executor, verifier) in a 3-member project team, complete role-specific contribution evaluation forms (5-point scale), and demonstrate team collaboration competence by achieving an average of over 4 points in peer evaluations.
Evaluation of educational effectiveness by comparing differences between virtual and physical laboratory environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
